tool_description: Records completion of maintenance tasks, captures performance data, and updates equipment maintenance history.

completion_status.description: Task completion status (completed, partially_completed, failed, deferred)

actual_start_time.description: Actual start time of maintenance work

actual_end_time.description: Actual completion time of maintenance work

parts_used.description: Array of part numbers actually used

issues_found.description: Array of issues discovered during maintenance

error_messages: Invalid work order: work_order_id not found or already completed.
Invalid completion status: Use one of [completed, partially_completed, failed, deferred].
Invalid time sequence: actual_end_time must be after actual_start_time.
Mismatched parts arrays: parts_used and quantities_used arrays must have the same length.
Invalid condition rating: equipment_condition_rating must be between 1 and 10.
Missing technician notes: technician_notes cannot be empty for completed tasks.
usage: Provide work_order_id, completion_status, actual start/end times, and technician_notes. Optionally include parts_used, quantities_used, issues_found, follow_up_required, and equipment_condition_rating to create comprehensive completion records.

next_scheduled_maintenance.description: Next scheduled maintenance date based on completion

cost_summary.description: Total cost including labor and parts
